getColor

public java.awt.Color getColor()

getColorPolicy

public static int getColorPolicy()
Returns the color policy for painting roads. May be one of the following:
COLOR_POLICY_DEFAULT - paint all roads the default color
COLOR_POLICY_HIGHLIGHT_TRAVEL - highlight the roads that are currently being traveled
COLOR_POLICY_DISTANCE_GRADIENT - paint roads according to their length value

setColorPolicy

public static void setColorPolicy(int policy)
Sets the colorPolicy to one of the following:
COLOR_POLICY_DEFAULT - paint all roads the default color
COLOR_POLICY_HIGHLIGHT_TRAVEL - highlight the roads that are currently being traveled
COLOR_POLICY_DISTANCE_GRADIENT - paint roads according to their length value

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if an unrecognized policy is given

isOnLine

public boolean isOnLine(java.awt.Point p)
Returns true if Point p is within ON_LINE_TOLERANCE pixels of this line
